abstract.para: This document explains the content of the MMC mail plugin configuration file

section.title: Introduction
section.para: The « mail » plugin allows the MMC to add/remove mail delivery management attributes to users and groups, and mail virtual domains, etc. It uses the « base » plugin for all its related LDAP operations.

Like all MMC related configuration file, its file format is INI style. The file is made of sections, each one starting with a « [sectionname] » header. In each section options can be defined like this « option = value ».

For example:
[section1] option1 = 1 option2 = 2
[section2] option1 = foo option2 = plop

section.title: Zarafa support
section.para: The zarafa.schema file must be included into the LDAP directory.
If Zarafa support is enabled, the "zarafa-user" object class will be automatically added to users if the administrator gives them mail access thanks to the MMC web interface.

section.title: Section « mapping »
section.para: When using an existing LDAP your mail attributes may not have the same name than the attributes of our mail.schema. The MDS mail plugin support attribute mapping so that you can use your LDAP without modification.
The following attributes can be mapped to other values: mailalias, maildrop, mailenable, mailbox, mailuserquota, mailhost
